testUtterance: This text is meant to test if these English voices sound as good as they should.

voices.label: Emma (US)
voices.name: Microsoft EmmaMultilingual Online (Natural) - English (United States)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Jenny (US)
voices.name: Microsoft Jenny Online (Natural) - English (United States)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. It can also be installed on Windows 11 but isn't currently accessible through the Web Speech API.

voices.label: Ava (US)
voices.name: Ava
voices.note: This voice can be installed on all Apple devices and offers three variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Zoe (US)
voices.name: Zoe
voices.note: This voice can be installed on all Apple devices and offers three variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Allison (US)
voices.name: Allison
voices.note: This voice can be installed on all Apple devices and offers two variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Samantha (US)
voices.name: Samantha (Enhanced)
voices.note: While this is meant to identify the highest quality variant for the Samantha voice, it can be difficult to do so due to inconsistencies in how voices are exposed to browsers through the Web Speech API. Since the lowest quality of the Samantha voice is pre-loaded on Apple devices, the situation is worse than with other voices that need to be installed.

voices.label: Joelle (US)
voices.name: Joelle
voices.note: This voice can be installed on all Apple devices. Unlike most other voices on Apple devices, Joelle has a single variant. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

Since the lowest quality of the Daniel voice is pre-loaded on Apple devices, the situation is worse than with other voices that need to be installed.

voices.label: Female Google voice (US)
voices.name: Google US English
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Chrome on desktop. Utterances that are longer than 14 seconds long can trigger a bug with this voice, check the notes in the project's README for more information.

voices.label: Female Google voice (UK)
voices.name: Google UK English Female
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Chrome on desktop. Utterances that are longer than 14 seconds long can trigger a bug with this voice, check the notes in the project's README for more information.

voices.label: Male Google voice (UK)
voices.name: Google UK English Male
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Chrome on desktop. Utterances that are longer than 14 seconds long can trigger a bug with this voice, check the notes in the project's README for more information.

voices.label: Zira (US)
voices.name: Microsoft Zira - English (United States)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: David (US)
voices.name: Microsoft David - English (United States)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Samantha (US)
voices.name: Samantha
voices.note: This entry is meant to identify the pre-loaded variant of the Samantha voice, but it might not work on all browsers. In some cases, the previous entry might be the one detecting the pre-loaded variant unfortunately.

voices.label: Nicky (US)
voices.name: Nicky
voices.note: Nicky is missing the usual info about voice quality in its name, which means that we can't identify its variants. For this reason, this voice is listed lower than other high quality voices available for Apple devices. That said, Nicky is probably the best pre-loaded voice on Apple devices.

voices.label: Daniel (UK)
voices.name: Daniel
voices.note: This entry is meant to identify the pre-loaded variant of the Daniel voice, but it might not work on all browsers. In some cases, the previous entry might be the one detecting the pre-loaded variant unfortunately.

voices.label: Female voice 1 (US)
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google en-us-x-tpc-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to natural voice and offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google en-us-x-tpc-local

voices.label: US voice
voices.name: English United States
voices.note: On Android, voice selection is only supported at a system level and Web Speech API doesn't return a true list of voices available, just a list of languages and regions
